# AgentC2 - AI Agent Operations Platform
> Build, deploy, and orchestrate AI agents with voice, MCP integrations, and background jobs.

## API
- [Agent Invocation](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/agents/{id}/invoke): POST - Run an agent
- [Agent Chat](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/agents/{id}/chat): POST - Stream chat with agent
- [MCP Gateway](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/mcp): POST - Execute MCP tools
- [RAG Query](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/rag/query): POST - Semantic search
- [Health](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/health): GET - Platform health status

## Authentication
API key via X-API-Key header or Authorization: Bearer header.

## Capabilities
- Multi-provider AI (OpenAI, Anthropic) with model routing
- MCP tool integrations (HubSpot, Jira, Slack, GitHub, Firecrawl, and more)
- RAG pipeline with hybrid vector + keyword search
- Voice agents via ElevenLabs and OpenAI Realtime
- Agent-to-agent delegation and multi-agent networks
- Background job processing via Inngest

## Docs
- [API Reference](https://agentc2.ai/docs/api-reference)
- [Agent Federation](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/federation/agent-card)
- [Marketplace](https://agentc2.ai/agent/api/federation/marketplace)
